contents:
Hi, I’m Jay! I’m passionate about mobile development, web development, and everything tech.

  • Experience: 5+ years in mobile and web dev.
  • Specialties: Flutter, Hugo, Node.js.
  • Goal: Sharing knowledge through blogging and tutorials.

Thanks for visiting my blog!
title: About Me

contents:
Want to get in touch? Feel free to reach out!

  • Email: jay@example.com
  • Twitter: @JayDev
  • GitHub: github.com/JayDev

I’d love to hear from you!
title: Contact

contents: A beginner’s guide to mobile development.
title: Introduction to Mobile Development

contents:
Here are some projects I’ve worked on:

  1. Task Manager App: A Flutter-based mobile app for managing tasks in real-time.
  2. Portfolio Website: Built with Hugo and customized themes.
  3. API Backend: A Node.js API for a task management system.

Check them out and let me know what you think!
title: My Projects
